solution_line_template: To gain entry into the strawberry fields, Sally, Jenny and Moses paid a total of {entrance_fee_per_person} * {number_of_pickers} = <<{entrance_fee_per_person}*{number_of_pickers}={total_entrance_fee}>>{total_entrance_fee} dollars

This means that before Miguel applied the ${total_entrance_fee} discount, the cost was {total_paid} + {total_entrance_fee} = <<{total_paid}+{total_entrance_fee}={pre_discount_cost}>>{pre_discount_cost} dollars
We get the weight by dividing the cost by the price of strawberries per pound, {pre_discount_cost}/{price_per_pound} = <<{pre_discount_cost}/{price_per_pound}={total_pounds}>>{total_pounds} pounds
